attributes.action: Displaying our National Symbols with Pride
attributes.additional_details: Claim back our flag and national symbols from those that have hijacked them in the name of intolerance and ingnorance. This Petition seeks to encourage the government to Mandate that our National Flag (Union Flag) be flown on all National, Local Government Buildings along with Schools, Universities etc along with the corresponding National Flags for England, Scotland, Northern Irleand and wales. It also seeks to encourage the Government to Mandate the displaying of an Official Portraits of HM Queen. All too often these symbols have vanished from display.
